articles.title: Singaporean rapper Shigga Shay sells out 999 NFTs from debut Spacebars collection in 4 minutes - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Based on the cover of his 365 EP released in 2020, the animated artworks feature a cartoon iteration of the rapper as an astronaut. The accompanying soundtrack includes a rap he wrote specially for the collection.
articles.content:
Singaporean rapper Shigga Shays debut non-fungible token (NFT) collection, Spacebars, sold out in four minutes. All 999 artworks were snapped up upon its release on Wed (April 13).

articles.title: Simu Liu commemorates 10th anniversary of getting fired from accountant job - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Marvel star even thanked the people at Deloitte Toronto for doing for him what he never had the courage to do for himself. “You destroyed a life that I was building for someone else, so that I could finally begin to build a life for me.”
articles.content:
Marvel star Simu Liu recently celebrated a very special anniversary. Ten years ago, on Apr 12, he was fired from Deloitte Toronto where he worked as an accountant.
